The efficiency of the reconstructed Dungeon Cores was unfortnuately and unexpectedly low. After some further investigation, I recognized a flaw in my reconstruction process.
The concept used by the people of the Unreachable was to link the units of the core to a torus-shaped network. I can mimic this by combining two Dungeon Cores together.
This improved design permits an extremely large amount of core power.
Note: This power is influenced by the power of both Dungeon Cores during assembly.
Hint: Refer to "Standard Core" for general information on cores.
